title: kingk29
author: kingk29
created_time: August 06, 2022, 08:09:48 AMLast edit: August 06, 2022, 06:23:54 PM by kingk29
content: Hi everyone,I'm selling a fully in-depth guide that will teach how to make hundreds of dollars per day selling Bitcoin from day one of with ease. All the hard work, trial and error, and sleepless nights working have been done for you. You can easily make 1k in revenue, 10-30% in profit, in an hour then go on about your day. Even if Bitcoin crashes by 20-30% in a day you'll still be in profit since this method is not based on speculation like normal crypto trading.With that being said, this business carries risk like any online business does but with my techniques you'll learn how to minimize those risks. You won't ever have to worry about having your account closed or funds put on hold by your payment processor if you follow my instructions. Chargebacks and frozen funds won't be an issue.Please note this is not an investment I'm offering, I'm simply selling a fully comprehensive guide on how you will create and run a business that you own and run yourself. This isn't passive and requires some work to get setup but afterwards it will be some of the easiest money you'll ever make. It's just as easy and common to make a $500 sale in minutes as it is to make a $20 sale. It's very easy to make sales, you don't even need to advertise, market, network, or do SEO so it doesn't take a lot of time out of your day. And you can start with as little as $160 to $260 USD. It's mostly just copy and paste once you're up and running, if you are lazy this is for you!I'll be selling the guide for $100 to the first few people then $500+ afterwards. The deal I'm offering is crazy. This small price will be earned back in a day or 2 of after launching your business. The turnaround time of each investment is around 1 to 3 days. It's not a probability that you may or may not make money, you WILL earn your money back and make this a reliable income.This is not a get rich quick method, it will provide you a solid 100k to 200k USD per year in profit if you do the work. If you are not willing to put some money towards the business this is not for you.Why are you selling this information if it makes so much money?The method still works and will work for years to come but I'm burned out. I still use it to this day but I've been doing this for so long I'm actually tired of it and want to take a break from it for a while. After some thought I've decided to sell the method on top of actually using it for extra income. Over saturation won't be a problem since I'm only selling this to a handful of people. Besides, there hasn't been much competition in this industry for years now so I don't mind sharing it with a few people to raise funds.Are there any requirements?1. You must be a US citizen with a SSN.2. You must have money to put toward the business.3. You must have a decent credit score of 500+.4. You must not have any bankruptcies in the past 6-12 months.5. You must have patience.Do you have any proof?I have proof of income and screenshots of conversation with people who also use this method. Mods, admins, and one trusted member will receive a free copy to confirm this guide is authentic.Proof Images (Disable VPN or else imgur won't load):https://imgur.com/a/073yGdwPricingBase Method $100For the Base Method you'll learn pretty much everything on how to run the business and how to prevent holds. Holds are possible but you'll learn how to mitigate them significantly. It's very unlikely using the techniques you will learn from me. Some guys I've worked with have never had a hold after years of business. You'll earn back what you spent on the guide within days of launching the business.What you get:-I'll show you where to process payments without risk of account closures and exactly what to say to them and what to expect.-Where to buy Bitcoin for the lowest fees possible.-Which crypto friendly bank account to use.-Where and how you will sell Bitcoin.-How to easily make sales from day one.-How to conveniently complete sales with customers in no more than 5 minutes.-How to eliminate scammers and keep your chargeback ratio below 1%.-I'll provide templates I use so that running the business is literally just copy and paste.I originally intended to provide a mostly completed website along with this package but I ran into technical difficulties while cloning the site. Instead you'll get templates for important pages that your site needs. If I make enough sales it might motivate me to rebuild it from scratch again The first few copies sold will be only $100 USD. Prices will increase significantly as more copies are sold. Admins, Moderators, and one Trusted Member will receive a free copy to review and verify it's legitimacy.I accept Cashapp, PayPal, Credit Card via invoice or Cryptocurrency payments of your choice(BTC, LTC, ETH, USDT, USDC, TRX, XLM, XMR). We can use an escrow service if you'd like. We'll exchange Telegram contact information you'll be delivered all information and documents necessary to get started. I look forward to a long term solid relationship with you If you're interested in learning more, checkout the FAQ link below:https://pastebin.com/ZBWM7EpdThis is a FAQ document that's easier to read. Open it with WordPad:https://www.mediafire.com/file/j4wd9umvuzfrmhd/FAQ.rtf/fileProof Images (Disable VPN or else imgur won't load):https://imgur.com/a/073yGdwBTC METHOD Virustotal Scan:https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/1f5d06ba382c32855e7dd7021d8929343136cb2d458bc25e76a1c2eaaf6d84cf?nocache=1

comments.author: kingk29
comments.body: On second thought it turns out its way easier to just use the method than trying to sell it... I'll just stick to using it myself, shame I actually wanted to help people.If anyone has any interest I'll be checking this post and DMs for a while.

comments.author: Killredillla
comments.body: Nothing gives me more pleasure then a fresh newbie account selling a money making guide, i have to say i haven't really seen these scams in a while now.In all seriousness tho, OP are you dumb or do you think the members here are ? who the fuck discovers a money printing method then sells it to people instead of using it himself ?Quote from: kingk29 on August 06, 2022, 08:09:48 AMThis is not a get rich quick method, it will provide you a solid 100k to 200k USD per year in profit if you do the work. If you are not willing to put some money towards the business this is not for you.This is exactly a get rich quick scheme, wtf are you on ?Quote from: kingk29 on August 06, 2022, 10:03:20 PMOn second thought it turns out its way easier to just use the method than trying to sell it... I'll just stick to using it myself, shame I actually wanted to help people.If anyone has any interest I'll be checking this post and DMs for a while.FUCK OFF!

comments.author: kingk29
comments.created_time: August 06, 2022, 11:31:16 PMLast edit: August 06, 2022, 11:50:20 PM by kingk29
comments.body: You're extremely rude. Why even come on this post to talk shit about things you know nothing about? You couldve simply went on your way and said nothing. I take pride in the integrity of my business and the way I deal with people and customers and what you said is crazy disrespectful.You've proven absolutely nothing based on your emotions and skepticism. All your message did was was show how stupid you are and what type of person you are. You've provided no evidence whatsoever but have the audacity to call me a scammer? What does my activity on forums have to do with my legitimacy? Because I don't spend all my time being a keyboard warrior talking shit to random people about things that won't make me a dime? It's clear to see you've never touched money like this before. Because it would come as no surprise to anyone who has experienced making large sums of money THAT THESE THINGS EXIST, PEOPLE JUST DONT TALK ABOUT IT UNLESS YOURE PAYING THEM. Not everyone is a greedy stingy fuck like yourself. Why not share? I've clearly explained why I want to sell this guide. I STILL USE IT TILL THIS DAY BUT IT'S FASTER TO SELL IT THAN WAITING FOR PAYOUTS FROM PAYMENT PROCESSORS. I WANT TO HELP PEOPLE YOU MORON. People I've worked with understand the value of it and have paid for this information. If you don't have the funds just shut up and keep it pushing, your negativity is not needed. You think making 100k to 200k a year means youre rich lolI will literally make a sale within 10 minutes and post the video for you if you want.Word of advice, don't talk shit to random people if you don't know what the fuck youre talking about. You'd get knocked out instantly if you said that to another grown mans face. If you won't say it in person don't say it online.Turns out this idiot didnt even click the links I added as proof... If this is what I have to deal with I'm better off just keeping it to myself and the people I work with, it's not worth having to deal with people like this lolPlease don't reply.

comments.body: Why is this guy still here More baseless claims calling someone a scammer who youve spoken to a day in your life. I don't care I'll just use it for myself. Some losers just cant be helped. But what could I expect coming from a penny pincher like yourself who gambles away money who looks to survey sites and crypto faucet to make money lmao oh by the way my guide includes unlimited real phone numbers from any area code you need for the sake of account verificationThe truth can be posted in this idiots face and he'll still deny it. For what purpose did this lame come to my post to hate and spread FUD for no reason? He's never even done business with me or even bothered to inquire about what it is I do and how'll you'll be making money with me, which I'd be glad to do for anyone who isnt a complete nincompoop like this guy. You just know this guy is a complete loser whos never had an ounce success in his miserable life, just hating for no reason. With ZERO evidence given yet I've posted plenty of evidence....I even said we can use PayPal or Cashapp if you prefer. The literal worst ways to accept payment since you can refund those at will. This man is so crazy it's bizarre...I even said we could use a escrow service and give free copies to a moderator for validation...bizarre behavior Would you rather I sell it for $10k as some other guys do? Or should I sell it at a low price that people can actually afford at least before I raise prices? $100 dollars is really breaking the bank for you I see. I swear some people are so dumb it's crazy. Random loser harassing my thread for no reason while I'm literally trying to help people. I spent 3-4 weeks putting this together just for some random hater to come downplay it. This gotta be the devil lolYou can lead the donkey (the ass, that you) to water but you cant make him drink...People with money understand that game aint free and you have to pay money to make money. Go away with your broke antics. Guy is seriously complaining over paying $100 for something that will change his pathetic life. This shit will pay you $100 in a hour...Would you like to see me charge $100 within the next 10 minutes? I will if you ask.I can not stand people with a negative poor mindset, always skeptical because nothing in life goes their way so you think everything good is a scam.Who hurt you?Go away. Go send out some referral links. Go find a new faucet to pay you 1 dollar this month. Go do some surveys. Go speculate on where you think prices will be with your crystal ball. Go do something just gtfo of here and let people who want to do something with their life live.If a mod would like to go over the guide and materials I'll provide that's cool "Wow you are  in fact a dumbass, do you really think anyone in 2022 is buying this shit ? i don't need a proof to know that what you're offering is a complete scam and, in fact iam surprised that you are unable to comprehand that."This is funny because if he would've actually checked the proof I posted he would've clearly seen that yes, people have and will pay me to coach them, some people are so dumb it's crazy. Dumb just to be dumb. "comprehand" im cryingi can not comprehand why people like this exist[moderator's note: consecutive posts merged]
